item.description:
Love Machine Valentine’s Party to Benefit the Boston Dyke March

Saturday February 13

7.30 pm Speed Dating

10 pm DJ & dancing

Dyke Night’s Second Saturdays at Machine will open up early on Valentine’s for the Love Machine. Meet a love connection or some new friends Speed Dating, registration at 7.30 pm. We’ll host a fantabulous raffle and silent auction as well as great prizes for our fun & feisty valentine’s scavenger hunt. DJ Kris Kono hits the decks at 10 pm till 2 am with a sultry sexy dance number at midnight by the Love Machine dancers. And per usual Dyke Night style, we’ll be sharing the love as this event is a fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March.

Details/E-list at www.dykenight.com

Machine Nightclub, 1254 Boylston St, Boston, MA 02215 21+

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Speed Dating & Love Machine Valentine’s Dyke March Benefit Dance Party @ Machine
